TopicTitle: MiG-21, A-10, Gloster Meteor Replicas! [WITH DOWNLOAD!]

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, welcome to my post!

Today I'm presenting 3 aircraft replicas, in 1 thread!

All of them are under 70 parts!

But, before anything:

 THIS 3 AIRCRAFT USE FAR.

Okay, let's start!:

* * *

MiG-21:

Soviet Era Supersonic fighter jet.

PICS:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/9cK64)

The intake is there, look closer.

* * *

A-10:

70's era ground attack aircraft.

PICS:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/HAe3v)

* * *

Gloster Meteor:

WW2 era british jet fighter.

PICS:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/J4nFr)

* * *
ACTION GROUPS:
1. Raise Flaps

2. Lower Flaps

Brakes. Wheel brakes and air brakes.

Downloads:

[Mig-21](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ifv9lfsybvs43wk/Mig-21.craft?dl=0)

[A-10](https://www.dropbox.com/s/37wy3g7zxqlqf7l/A-10.craft?dl=0)

[Gloster Meteor](https://www.dropbox.com/s/pqfeqb4tlusvj5a/Gloster%20Meteor.craft?dl=0)

Thanks for reading, and hope you have fun with my planes!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-02T00:01:19Z" title="06/02/2015 12:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 2, 2015</time> by gmpd2000**

As a fellow player of DCS I really like the planes you choose - especially MiG-21. It looks like a lil bit improved version with smaller nose cone - could be some post cold war upgrade hehe.

A-10 is almost spot on, but missing the noisy big gatling of course ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Gloster looks like gloster, not much to add. 

With some modded parts you can make those even closer to RL, but still its a very cool job Gmod.

-I will try them later and see how they flies, thanks for sharing the craft files.

PS: we need ekranoplan that works!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T20:37:51Z" title="06/01/2015 08:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by mordin86**

> PS: we need ekranoplan that works!

You saw the stream, It's near impossible!
I have some downloads registered, but no one has opinions on these planes? Come on, don't be shy, post them!

MiG-21 is def my favourite - funny thing it actually feels like a 21 hehe - very fun to fly. 

I think A-10 would benefit from some more pitch - itshart to convince it to fly "up".

btw, my impressions are from KSP with out FAR mod.
